subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN6057 is on the way
description_text:
Hi,

I wanted to inquire about the status of my order, it's been almost a week
and it's still not being shipped, just wondering if there's some delays and
when i can expect it, as i'm going on a trip in another week.

Cheers,
Alejandro.
